Grandma's Apple Pie Recipe

Ingredients:
- 6 large Granny Smith apples, peeled and sliced
- 3/4 cup sugar
- 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
- 1 teaspoon cinnamon
- 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
- 1 tablespoon butter
- Pie crust (homemade or store-bought)

Preheat oven to 425Â°F. Mix apples with sugar, flour, and spices. Pour into crust, dot with butter, cover with top crust. Bake 45-50 minutes until golden brown.
